attributes.action: New starter furlough: Support workers who started their job from 28th Feb 2020
attributes.background: The recent announcement and clarification of the government grants to help support furloughing works who otherwise would have been laid off as a result of the pandemic has a major oversight in new workers joining the payroll. The government should include those who started a job from the 28/2/20.
